text: Henry "Huntz" Hall (August 15, 1919 - January 30, 1999) was a well-known American actor. He was best known as Dippy in the Dead End Kids series. He made 78 movies. == Trivia == *He is one of the famous people who appeared on the cover of The Beatles, Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band album. Category:1919 births Category:1999 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from New York City
title: Huntz Hall
